title: Please Adivce the font.
content:
Hello Everyone,

I am looking for this font, they are very common but I am unable to decide what are they.

Thank to all you lovely people for looking and help.

Regards,  
Hash

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826130330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/oak2_6257.jpg)
author: hasnain125

comments.content: There is no actual 'font' involved here. This is embroidery.

Looks like a generic monoline serif, like the upper case from a typewriter font, e.g. [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/prestige-elite/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826130330/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/prestige-elite/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/prestige-elite/") or a monoline serif like ITC Officina Serif [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/officina-serif/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826130330/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/officina-serif/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/officina-serif/") or Brix Slab Condensed [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/brix-slab-condensed/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826130330/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/brix-slab-condensed/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/brix-slab-condensed/")  
If you want to use it on an embroidery machine there are companies that sell fonts for use on the machines, e.g. [http://www.8clawsandapaw.com/typewriter-alphabet-embroidery-design.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826130330/http:/www.8clawsandapaw.com/typewriter-alphabet-embroidery-design.html "http://www.8clawsandapaw.com/typewriter-alphabet-embroidery-design.html") or [http://www.8clawsandapaw.com/back-to-basics-embroidery-fonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826130330/http:/www.8clawsandapaw.com/back-to-basics-embroidery-fonts.html "http://www.8clawsandapaw.com/back-to-basics-embroidery-fonts.html")  
Don
